name: Crashed in the Dark Ages
description:
This is a base builder prototype built for the Kenny Jam in August 2018

You are a Time-Traveler who crashed in the Dark Ages. You need to build up a settlement if you ever want to fix your Time-Machine.

Game is very much a prototype, with no end goal currently implemented. Scripts are unpolished, and there may be bugs.

Oh, I forgot to put in the game that you can use the Arrow keys to move around the map.

Thanks for checking out my prototype!
